Objective: Verify navigating through categories through left column buttons in categories page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click on the categories dropdown button below the search bar
2) Click a subcategory
3) Click a category in the left column
Expected Result:
1) The Product listing should change accordingly for selected category
2) The categories button should expand and show all subcategories
3) The Products should be relevant

Objective: Verify navigating through sub categories through left column buttons in categories page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click on the categories dropdown button below the search bar
2) Click a subcategory
3) Click a category in the left column (ER-01,ER-02)
4) Click a subcategory (ER-03, ER-04)
Expected Result:
1) The Product listing should change accordingly for selected category
2) The categories button should expand and show all subcategories
3) The Product listing should change accordingly for selected subcategory
4) The products should be relevant

Objective: Verify the number of items displayed in product listing is 10 in 1st page for more than 10 listings in a category by default
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps: 1) Click on the categories dropdown button below the search bar and click show all button for which the number of items in a category for more than 10 items
Expected Result: The number of items displayed in 1st page should be 10 and buttons to navigate to next pages should be available

Objective: Verify clicking the number button takes user to clicked page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click on the categories dropdown button below the search bar and click show all button for which the number of items in a category for more than 10 items
2) Click a number in page navigation section in bottom page
Expected Result: The User should be taken to the clicked page number

Objective: Verify clicking the next button takes user to next page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click on the categories dropdown button below the search bar and click show all button for which the number of items in a category for more than 10 items
2) Click next button in page navigation section in bottom page
Expected Result: The User should be taken to the next page

Objective: Verify clicking the last button page takes user to last page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click on the categories dropdown button below the search bar and click show all button for which the number of items in a category for more than 10 items
2) Click last page button in page navigation section in bottom page
Expected Result: The User should be taken to the last page

Test Steps:

Expected Result:
The navigation section should have the below buttons
First page button
Previous page button
Page number buttons

Last page button

Objective: Verify clicking the previous button takes user to next page

Objective: Verify Sorting functionality in Categories page
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click on the categories dropdown button below the search bar and select the show all button
2) Click Sort and select an option
Expected Result: The Products should be sorted according to the selected sort option

Objective: Verify the Product listings for list and grid arrangements
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click on the categories dropdown button below the search bar and select the show all button
2) Click List option (ER-01)
3) Click Grid option (ER-01)
Expected Result:
1) The products should be arranged by list
2) The products should be arranged by grid

Objective: Verify the show number of listings functionality
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click on the categories dropdown button below the search bar and select the show all button
2) Click the dropdown in Show section and select an option
Expected Result: The number of Product listings should be listed properly according to the selected option

Objective: Verify the refine search functionality
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login

1) Click on the categories dropdown button below the search bar and select the show all button
2) Click the buttons under refine search
Expected Result: The Products should be listed according to the selected option

Objective: Verify the Categories Page functionality in all the supported environments
Precondition: 1) Open the site in any supported browser and login
Test Steps:
1) Click on the categories dropdown button below the search bar and select the show all button
2) Repeat from Step-1 for other environments
Expected Result: The Categories page should work in all supported environments
